in /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages (from pandas->fastai) (2018.9) Requirement already satisfied: joblib>=0.11 in /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages (from scikit-learn->fastai) (1.0.1) Installing collected packages: fastcore, fastai Attempting uninstall: fastai Found existing installation: fastai 1.0.61 Uninstalling fastai-1.0.61: Successfully uninstalled fastai-1.0.61 Successfully installed fastai-2.4.1 fastcore-1.3.21 . Get the dataset . from fastai.vision.all import * path = untar_data(URLs.PETS)/'images' . Train the model and show the error rate. . def is_cat(x): return x[0].isupper() dls = ImageDataLoaders.from_name_func(path, get_image_files(path), valid_pct=0.2, seed=42, label_func=is_cat, item_tfms=Resize(224)) learn = cnn_learner(dls, resnet34, metrics=error_rate) learn.fine_tune(1) . Upload an image to detect a cat. . from google.colab import files uploaded = files.upload() . Upload widget is only available when the cell has been executed in the current browser session. Please rerun this cell to enable. Saving cat.jpg to cat (1).jpg . Run prediction. . import PIL for k, v in uploaded.items(): img = PILImage.create(v) is_cat,_, probs = learn.predict(img) print(f'Is this a cat? {is_cat}') . Is this a cat? True .
